values:
i just realized how much garbage my roommate and i go through--there are three trash cans in our room, and we empty all three of them at least once a week
which is a lot of trash for two people. damn packaging.
and that doesnt even include food waste!
i recycle every weekend! honest!

am feeling very dirty and wasteful.

please recycle

ok, it's gotten so bad that now i do pushups instead of studying. PUSHUPS. what will it be next?  




oh yeah. updating my livejournal, which i havent done in months.
sorry kids.

don't wait up for me. 
::blink::

baby you can never go wrong with fiona
a little angst never hurt anyone, 
agreed?

Existentialism on Prom Night

when the sun came up
we were sleeping in
sunk inside our blankets
sprawled across the bed
and we were dreaming
there are moments when i know it
and the world revolves around us
and we're keeping it
keeping it all going
this delicate balance
vulnerable
all knowing
(sing like you think no one's listening)
you would kill for this
just a little bit
so, sing me something soft
sad and delicate
or loud and out of key
sing me anything
we're glad for what we've got
done with what we've lost
our whole lives laid out right in front of us

don't hate me...but i really want to get britney tickets...come on, she puts on the best shows! okay, okay, i know what you're thinking

besides, floor tickets are $100.20 CAD.

wtf? how can she charge 12 year olds that much money for one concert?!

I'm actually going skiing!! Let's see how long this lasts...in terms of ski clothes, (flipflops? what?) I'm borrowing a friend's ski instructor suit that's BRIGHT RED and says "ski school" everywhere, in french, of course.
It'll be quite the sight to see a ski instructor falling all over herself...hahaha yeah, that'll be me.

anyone have any tips for a first-timer?

not a virgin anymore! this is my first entry ever...
I'm feeling very productive for finally making a journal! 
phew, just got home from school, which means the lower half of my body is entirely numb
and my brain too...

hmm--
could go for some pizza
quick! gotta relax with some peace and quiet (and by peace and quiet i OBV mean frou frou) before the roommate gets in...

everyone should download all the mirwais and mekon they can find

that means YOU 
*points*
